title: When I try to name on of my mastery pages using support it censors support

replies.body:
well part of the word "support" is "port" which cables go into so sex because "goes into" haha funny


######don't ban me#######
This is a mistake on our part. Our profanity filter is going ham at the moment - we will roll it back to be less aggressive! No ETA yet, but you should be able to name mastery pages normally soon.
I was going to say is the filter having a stroke or something lol. It isn't the biggest deal in the world I was just a little confused.

Because support...

Suppor...

Suppo...

Supp...

Sup...

Pus.
Depending on the algorithm this could actually be true xD
you have to change it into "autofilled"
Makes me wonder if they switched to a multilingual censoring system.
Yeah, it censored the "cai" in caitlyn too. Why?
